JobTitle: Sr Regional Operations Manager - Restaurant Connection, Performance & Money
JobFullDesc: About the Role The Senior Regional Operations Manager will be responsible for designing and improving Performance, Connection, and Money / Invoicing processes and programs for restaurant partners in LatAm. In addition, this individual will lead a team of 3 Product Champions that serve as the liaison between the Product team in HQ and the LatAm region. This person will anticipate how restaurants make decisions, persistently explore and uncover the needs and expectations of our restaurant partners, and understand how UberEats can empower and help them operate their business flawlessly. This role is a unique opportunity to grow and build the Operational strategy of restaurant partners while rethinking tools and processes to ensure that UberEats become the preferred partner for the restaurants. The ideal candidate for this role should have a proven track record in operations and strategy, strong analytics, excellent organizational skills, and the ability to communicate and present information to seek buy-in in a matrixed organization.
